title: English-Chinese translator②
input2: "zh-en translation of “在这个快速变化的世界中，适应能力是成功的关键“"
input1_ans: The translation of “我爱学习新语言” in English is "I love learning new languages."
input2_ans: "In this rapidly changing world, adaptability is the key to success."
The translation of “在这个快速变化的世界中，适应能力是成功的关键” is "In this rapidly changing world, adaptability is the key to success."
